stories.original_headline: Life may have started as sticky goo clinging to rocks
stories.original_summary: Life may have started in sticky, rock-hugging gels rather than inside cells. stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Sages Ponder Life's Sticky Beginnings on Stone!
stories.fantasy_story: Whispers from the Grand Alchemists' Circle suggest that life itself may have first stirred within humble, sticky gels clinging to ancient stones. These mysterious goo-like substances might have trapped tiny magical essences, nurturing them into the earliest forms of life. It’s believed that within these protective patches, the very first sparks of living enchantment began to glow.

stories.fantasy_headline: A Wandering Ice Shard from Beyond the Stars Sprays Sacred Waters!
stories.fantasy_story: For countless ages, a magnificent ice shard drifted between the distant star-kingdoms, only recently appearing in our own celestial realm. Astromancers, using their Grand Scrying Crystal, observed this rare visitor, detecting ancient, life-giving waters emanating from its frosty core. It is a wondrous sight, offering clues from the outer reaches of creation.
